data.title: The First Church of Rock n' Roll
data.text:
Preorder “Their Rock Is Not Our Rock” Vinyl Now!

Their Rock Is Not Our Rock is now available on vinyl for the first time as part of Ripple Music’s “Beneath The Desert Floor” series. Limited Cherry Marble Red and Midnight Black will release on August 9th, with preorders on sale now at the links below:

RIPPLE MUSIC STORE

RIPPLE MUSIC BANDCAMP

Fireball Ministry to play Planet Desert Rock Weekend V in Las Vegas, Jan 30- Feb 1, 2025

Tickets On Sale Now!

Related show

Artist: Fireball Ministry

Date: 01/30/25 - 02/01/25

Time: 6:00pm

Venue: Planet Desert Rock Weekend 2025

City: Las Vegas , NV

Country: United States

Buy Tickets

Notes: Vegas Rock Revolution present Planet Desert Rock Weekend V, a weekend of heavy rock from around the world with Fireball Ministry, Mos Generator, Valley of the Sun, Sergeant Thunderhoof, JIRM, Solace, Samavayo, Mr. Bison, Fire Down Below, Omega Sun, Sons of Arrakis, Godzillionaire, and more

Fireball Ministry joins the Ripple Music Roster

Fireball Ministry’s “The Second Great Awakening” on vinyl! Order Now!

For the first time ever on vinyl, Fireball Ministry’s 2003 classic “The Second Great Awakening” remastered gatefold LP on 180g opaque orange vinyl! Limited edition of 300 comes with specialty 3D 12″x12″ lenticular of album art by Dan Brereton.

ORDER NOW!

Limited Edition “Ou Est La Rock?” Communal Bread Colored Vinyl in the shop!

Fireball Ministry’s 1999 debut album “Ou est la Rock?” available now for the first time on vinyl! Remastered limited edition gatefold LP on communal “bread” colored vinyl. Now in the shop!

Fireball Ministry at The Black Heart London Sept 30!

Stoked to be back in London this fall! Get tickets here.
